name: Little Hero Adventurer
description:
Little Hero Adventurer is a top down shooter where your objective is to complete "dungeons" and get epic loot to help make you an epic adventurer.

Controls:

Mouse + Keyboard

Ingame:

Mouse1: Attack

WASD: Move

ESC: Pause menu

Menu:

Mouse1: Click

Left/Right arrow: Change inventory page
